snippet: Bobby Parnell flamed out in his audition for the Mets’ closer job last season. But his 100-mile-an-hour fastball still makes him intriguing.
abstract: New York Mets reliever Bobby Parnell is still working to earn a spot in the bullpen this season; Parnell flamed out in his audition for closer last season, but his 100-mile-an-hour fastball still makes him intriguing.
lead_paragraph: Bobby Parnell flamed out in his audition for the Mets’ closer job last season. But his 100-mile-an-hour fastball still makes him intriguing.

headline.seo: Having Failed His Big Audition, Parnell Tries to Rebound
headline.main: Having Failed His Big Audition, Parnell Tries to Rebound
headline.print_headline: After Failing Audition, Parnell Tries to Rebound
